fgeo.data

output: github_document

fgeo.data provides open datasets of ForestGEO.

See datasets

Installation

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("forestgeo/fgeo.data")

For details on how to install packages from GitHub, see this article.

Example

library(fgeo.data)

ViewFullTable (vft)

# Show first few columns to save space.
str(bci_vft_random, give.attr = FALSE, list.len = 5)
